壿字的基本解释

壿
义未详。

壿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dūn］
［《廣韻》徂尊切，平魂，從。］
亦作“踆3”。
(1)坐。
(2)指兽类踞伏。
(3)泛指物体立在地上。
(4)屈两腿如坐、臀部不着地。
(5)呆着；停留。
(6)屈曲；歪斜。
(7)书法用语。犹顿。
(8)控制或延缓作物茎叶生长，以利积累养分。
(9)通“噂”。参见“蹲沓”。
[②]［cún］
［《集韻》七倫切，平諄，清。］
亦作“壿1”。
(1)见“蹲2蹲”。
(2)方言。腿、脚猛然落地，因震动而受伤。
[③]［cǔn］
［《集韻》粗本切，上混，清。］
聚集，叠合。
[④]［qǔn］
［《集韻》趣允切，上準，清。］
见“蹲4循”、“蹲4節”。

壿字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【士字部】　壿； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页244第10
【集韻】七倫切，音逡。【爾雅·釋訓】喜也。【說文】舞也。引《詩》：壿壿舞我。○按《詩·小雅》今作蹲。　又【韻會】粗本切，音僔。義同。

壿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
壿字的起名意思

暂无。

graybeard
Basic explanation of words
graybeard
The meaning is unclear.
graybeard
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dūn］
["Guang Yun" Zu Zun cut, Ping Hun, from. ]
Also known as "踆3".
(1) Sit.
(2) Refers to beasts stalking.
(3) Generally refers to the object standing on the ground.
(4) Bent your legs like sitting, but keep your buttocks off the ground.
(5) Stay; stay.
(6) Buckling; skew.
(7) Calligraphy language. Judun.
(8) Control or delay the growth of crop stems and leaves to facilitate the accumulation of nutrients.
(9) Through "噂". See "squatting".
[②]［cún］
["Jiyun" Qi Lunqie, smooth and clear. ]
Also known as "壿1".
(1) See "Squat 2 Squat".
(2) Dialects. The legs and feet landed suddenly and were injured by the vibration.
[③] [cǔn]
["Jiyun" rough cut, mixed up, clear. ]
Gather, overlap.
[④] [qǔn]
["Jiyun" is interesting and cut, accurate and clear. ]
See "Squat 4 Cycles", "Squat 4 Sessions".
graybeard
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Shizi Department] 　壿; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 244 No. 10
[Jiyun] Qi Lunqie, sound faint. 【Erya·Shixun】Hi Ye. [Said Wen] Dance also. Quoting from "Poetry": Dancing with me. ○Press "Poetry·Xiaoya" for this work.　[Yunhui] The rough version is cut, and the sound is loud. The same meaning.
graybeard
